title: PMS 2.0 258 - NFL Week 3 Preview, Kyle Van Noy, Taylor Lewan, Chris Long & Ariel Helwani
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys look ahead to a couple of the key matchups in week 3 of the NFL season and make some of their gambling picks as well. Also joining the show is 2x Super Bowl Champion, member of the New England Patriots 2010's All-Decade team, a man who showed out last night in Jacksonville for the Dolphins, friend of the program, Kyle Van Noy. Pat and Kyle chat about last night's game, why he thinks their defense is starting to gel, his thoughts on Ryan Fitzpatrick, what he's thought of Tua so far, and what he's doing to enjoy the win (:28-7:28). Next, 3x Pro Bowler, co-host of the Bussin' With the Boys podcast, and current Offensive Tackle for the Tennessee Titans, Taylor Lewan. Pat and Taylor chat about the Titans season thus far, his thoughts on the season, what Mike Vrabel is like in the locker room, Jadeveon Clowney's impact, and how impressed he's been with Ryan Tannehill (7:30-32:45). Later, 2x Super Bowl Champion, #2 pick of the 2008 NFL Draft, former Walter Payton Man of the Year, and host of the Green Light podcast, Chris Long. Pat and Chris chat about the differences he noticed going from St. Louis to New England, if he ever had go one on one with his brother while in the NFL, what he thinks about all the overreaction from the media regarding the NFL teams, and why Tyrod Taylor's mishap with team doctors was just the tip of the iceberg of things that happen to players in the NFL (34:22-52:48). Lastly, ESPN MMA Insider, host of Ariel Helwani's MMA Show, co-host of Ariel & The Bad Guy, and friend of the program, Ariel Helwani joins the show to break down UFC 253 this weekend, when Jon Jones is expected to move to heavyweight, and what's going on with Conor McGregor right now (54:46-1:08:24). Subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow as we close in on 1 million subscribers and a $100,000 giveaway, and listen Monday-Friday Noon-3 ET on Mad Dog Radio, SiriusXM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, have an incredible weekend. Come and laugh with us, cheers.
